text: "The Pleasure Principle" is a new jack swing and pop song by the singer Janet Jackson. It is about her not wanting a loveless relationship and not settling for materialism. The song is from her album Control. The song hit #14 on the Billboard'" Hot 100. This was the only song from Jackson to not chart in the Top 10. It was released in May 1987. ==References== Category:1987 songs Category:Janet Jackson songs Category:Pop songs
title: The Pleasure Principle (song)
